notify.name: Notify! Alerts
notify.description: Send push notifications to iOS devices via Notify API

user.title: Configure Notify! Alerts
user.description: Enter your Notify API credentials. Get your Device ID and Token from the Notify app.

data_description.device_id: Your Notify device or group identifier from the iOS app
data_description.token: Your API authentication token from the iOS app
data_description.name: Optional: Custom name for this integration (e.g., 'My iPhone', 'Family Group'). If not provided, defaults to 'Notify! Alert (DEVICE_ID)'

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Notify API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid Device ID or Token. Please verify your credentials in the Notify app.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

init.title: Reconfigure Notify! Alerts
init.description: Update your Notify API credentials and optional default values. Default values are used when automations don't specify them, allowing you to set consistent styling once and override per-automation as needed.

data_description.device_id: Your Notify device or group identifier from the iOS app
data_description.token: Your API authentication token from the iOS app
data_description.default_title: Optional: Title used when automations don't specify one (e.g., 'Home Assistant')
data_description.default_icon_url: Optional: Icon URL used when automations don't specify one
data_description.default_group_type: Optional: Group type used when automations don't specify one (e.g., 'security', 'alerts')

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Notify API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid Device ID or Token. Please verify your credentials in the Notify app.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
